short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Analyzes Amazon reviews using NLP techniques to reveal important insights about the product

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TL;DR for Amazon chrome extension is a must-have for every Amazon shopper. It is designed to provide a quick overview of the selected product by analyzing product reviews and giving you a detailed analysis of what other buyers think about the product. It gives you an insight into product usability which is critical to know before actually buying the product. TL;DR for Amazon will help you learn from the experience of others and make better buying decisions without actually having to go through long and tedious list of reviews.
